sentence.text: The genes HLA complex P5 (HCP5), spermatogenesis associated 2 (regulation of tumor necrosis factor-mediated signaling pathway), tumour necrosis factor alpha-induced protein 3 (response to molecule of bacterial origin), TNFAIP3-interacting protein 1 (glycoprotein biosynthetic process) and the component of oligomeric Golgi complex 6 (glycosylation) were reported to be associated with psoriasis in western populations by genome-wide association studies.

entity.text: regulation of tumor necrosis factor-mediated signaling pathway
response to molecule of bacterial origin
